snippet.title: Thirsty Suitors - Official Reveal Trailer | Game Awards 2021
snippet.description:
Thirsty Suitors is a stylish, story-driven RPG about a young woman named Jala who returns to her hometown for her sister's wedding and must face all the mistakes and expectations she abandoned when she left, all while her grandmother sends suitors after her in hopes of making a match. Jala must balance the weight of societal, cultural, and familial expectations while making up for her past mistakes, all while skateboarding around town, taking on cooking challenges, and dealing with the suitors that arrive to win her heart.

#IGN #GameAwards2021 #Gaming
